mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label: Complete gacha is a gacha where users attempt to complete a full item or item set by getting all of the required components, which are earned through random chances.
mxTextCell.prevLabel: Complete gacha is a gacha where users attempt to complete a full item or item set by getting all of the required components, which are earned through random chances.

mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label: Package gacha gives the player a set number of items available in a pool, thus increasing the chances of better drops with each consecutive roll
mxTextCell.prevLabel: Package gacha gives the player a set number of items available in a pool, thus increasing the chances of better drops with each consecutive roll

mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label: Step-up gacha gives the player better chances at higher rarity items the more consecutive rolls they do in one sitting. Breaking the combo resets the chances to default
mxTextCell.prevLabel: Step-up gacha gives the player better chances at higher rarity items the more consecutive rolls they do in one sitting. Breaking the combo resets the chances to default

mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label: Scratch gachas give players "tickets" that give certain rare rewards once a number of total rolls has been achieved. The roll number resets to 0 after the ticket has been given.
mxTextCell.prevLabel: Scratch gachas give players "tickets" that give certain rare rewards once a number of total rolls has been achieved. The roll number resets to 0 after the ticket has been given.

mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label: Sugoroku gacha gives the player the ability to gain rewards by moving on a board and reaching certain milestones. The player moves on the board whenever he rolls on the gacha and rewards on the board get better as he advances. Advancing on the board is usually done through dice rolls.
mxTextCell.prevLabel: Sugoroku gacha gives the player the ability to gain rewards by moving on a board and reaching certain milestones. The player moves on the board whenever he rolls on the gacha and rewards on the board get better as he advances. Advancing on the board is usually done through dice rolls.
